info.title: Repensar Multiplatform Backend
info.description: Backend API for Repensar multiplatform application

get.description: Validate current JWT token and return user info.

schema.title: Response Validate Token Auth Validate Token Get

get.description: Check authentication status without requiring valid token.

schema.title: Response Get Auth Status Auth Status Get

get.description: Get current user's permissions and dashboard configuration.

schema.title: Response Get User Permissions Auth Permissions Get

post.description: Register a new volunteer with user account creation.

schema.title: Response Register Volunteer Volunteers Register Post

get.description: Get list of volunteers with filtering options.

schema.title: Response Deactivate Volunteer Volunteers  Volunteer Id  Delete

get.description: Get list of available volunteer skills.

schema.title: Response Get Available Skills Volunteers Skills Available Get

get.description: Get skills for a specific volunteer.

schema.title: Response Get Volunteer Skills Volunteers  Volunteer Id  Skills Get

post.description: Assign a skill to a volunteer.

schema.title: Response Remove Skill From Volunteer Volunteers  Volunteer Id  Skills  Skill Id  Delete
Response Get Volunteer Hours Volunteers  Volunteer Id  Hours Get
Response Delete Volunteer Hours Volunteers Hours  Time Log Id  Delete

post.description: Approve or reject volunteer time log.

schema.title: Response Get Volunteer Hours Summary Volunteers  Volunteer Id  Hours Summary Get

get.description: Get list of projects with filtering options.

schema.title: Response Get Projects Dashboard Projects Dashboard Get
Response Delete Project Projects  Project Id  Delete
Response Get Project Team Projects  Project Id  Team Get
Response Remove Team Member Projects  Project Id  Team  User Id  Delete
Response Get Project Milestones Projects  Project Id  Milestones Get
Response Delete Milestone Projects Milestones  Milestone Id  Delete
Response Get Project Metrics Projects  Project Id  Metrics Get
Response Delete Environmental Metric Projects Metrics  Metric Id  Delete

get.description: Get list of tasks with filtering options.

schema.title: Response Get Volunteer Available Tasks Tasks Volunteers Available Get
Response Delete Task Tasks  Task Id  Delete

get.description: Get volunteers assigned to a task.

schema.title: Response Get Task Volunteers Tasks  Task Id  Volunteers Get
Response Remove Volunteer From Task Tasks  Task Id  Volunteers  Volunteer Id  Delete
Response Get Task Dependencies Tasks  Task Id  Dependencies Get
Response Delete Task Dependency Tasks Dependencies  Dependency Id  Delete

get.description: Get tasks assigned to a volunteer.

schema.title: Response Get Volunteer Task Assignments Tasks Volunteers  Volunteer Id  Assignments Get

get.description: Get resources allocated to a project.

schema.title: Response Get Project Resources Resources Projects  Project Id  Resources Get
Response Get Project Reports Reports Projects Get
Response Get Volunteer Reports Reports Volunteers Get
Response Get Task Reports Reports Tasks Get
Response Get Resource Reports Reports Resources Get

get.description: Get dashboard summary with key metrics.

schema.title: Response Get Dashboard Summary Reports Dashboard Get
